explains: n. 追求者；追捕者；研究者；原告

sentences.en: She found that the pursuer was close at her heels.
sentences.cn: 她发现追赶者紧紧地跟在她后面。

sentences.en: But the biggest pursuer of such interests is China.
sentences.cn: 最看重这些利益的当属中国。

sentences.en: From then on, I always played the fugitive while the dog the pursuer.
sentences.cn: 以后见着狗，我总是逃，它也总是追，而且屡屡望着我的影子猛猛狂吠。
